Title: Breaking Bad
Description: A chemistry teacher turns to making meth after a cancer diagnosis.

Title: Stranger Things
Description: A group of kids uncover supernatural mysteries in their town.

Title: Game of Thrones
Description: Noble families battle for control of the Iron Throne.

Title: The Office

Description: Aang must master the elements and bring peace to the world.

Title: The Crown

Title: Grey's Anatomy
